vote.title: Authorize an amendment to the Program Statement for the Small Business Continuity Fund to clarify that job requirements are determined by the Community Development Block Grant program that require (1) the retention or creation of at least one job per grant and up to two jobs per loan rather than the requirement that recipients retain at least 80% of the workforce that they had as of February 29, 2020; and (2) that businesses continue their normal business operations to the extent allowed by local, state and federal law, for at least six months after the date of payment of the financial assistance - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
